description:
A woman http://anidb.net/ch4232 [Kojirou] bumped into and argued at a supermarket with during episode 9. She happens to be the neighbour of the superintendent of Muroe Koukou, where Kojirou is employed.
She also happens to be the mother of http://anidb.net/ch5419 [Reimi], as shown in episode 10.
name: Reimi Mama
